pr_title: Add TypeToFlinkType: convert iceberg types to Flink types

timeline.bodyText: I'd prefer to provide some separate unit tests to address the conversion differences ( so that we won't regress).
timeline.author: openinx

replies.bodyText: I'll add tests for the conversion differences.
replies.author: JingsongLi

timeline.bodyText: Precision isn't lost for date/time types. It is always microseconds.
timeline.author: rdblue

timeline.message: Add TypeToFlinkType: convert iceberg types to Flink types
